mapper.update: update MAIL_TEMPLATES set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SENDER = #{sender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DELETED_FLG = #{deletedFlg,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID, NAME, SENDER, UPDATED_AT, CREATED_AT, DELETED_FLG from MAIL_TEMPLATES
